idea-plugin.name: NexChatGPT
idea-plugin.description:
English

ChatGPT is a language model trained by OpenAI and can be used for a variety of tasks, including dialogue and text generation. ChatGPT is a neural network-based model that is trained on large amounts of human language data and is able to generate natural language text that is meaningful in a given context. The model can be used for many applications, such as natural language processing (NLP) and dialogue systems.

Features

  1. No need to login. You can use this even if you don't have a OpenAI account.
  2. Based on SSE(Server send event) technology, you can receive answer quickly.
  3. Easy to use. Type your question in the search input, then click send button or press Enter, you can receive answer immediately.

Tips: ChatGPT h5 group chat version

简体中文

ChatGPT是一种语言模型，它由OpenAI训练， 可以用于多种任务，包括对话和文本生成。ChatGPT 是一种基于神经网络的模型，它使用 人类语言的大量样本进行训练，可以在给定上下文的情 况下生成有意义的自然语言文本。 该模型可以用于许多应用，例如自然语言处理（NLP）和 对话系统。

特性

  1. 无需登录。即使你没有OpenAI账号也可以使用
  2. 基于SSE(Server send event)技术，你可以很快的收到回答
  3. 易于使用。在搜索框输入你的问题，然后点击send按钮或回车键,你可以很快接收到答案。

提示: ChatGPT h5群聊版本
